title: Schindler's List
description: Oskar Schindler, a German businessman, saves over a thousand Polish Jews during the Holocaust by employing them in his factory, risking his life to protect them from the Nazis.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Andy Dufresne, wrongly convicted of murder, forms a deep friendship with fellow inmate Ellis 'Red' Redding while seeking redemption and a sense of purpose in Shawshank prison.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life story of Forrest Gump, a slow-witted but kind-hearted man from Alabama, who witnesses and unwittingly influences several historical events in the 20th century United States.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A jury deliberates the guilt or innocence of a defendant, with one juror casting doubt on the evidence, leading to intense discussions and revelations about human nature and justice.

title: The Pianist
description: The true story of Władysław Szpilman, a Polish-Jewish pianist, who survives the Holocaust in Warsaw through his resilience and the help of strangers.

title: American Beauty
description: Lester Burnham, a middle-aged man experiencing a midlife crisis, becomes infatuated with his daughter's friend, leading to a series of events that challenge his suburban existence.

title: The Substance
description: A powerful exploration of addiction and recovery, focusing on an individual's journey through personal struggles and the impact on their relationships.

title: The Godfather Part II
description: The continuation of the Corleone family's saga, juxtaposing Michael Corleone's rise to power with flashbacks of his father's early life and rise in the Mafia.

title: The Green Mile
description: A death row corrections officer develops a unique relationship with an inmate who has a miraculous gift, leading to profound changes in their lives.

title: 365 Days: This Day
description: Laura and Massimo's passionate relationship faces new challenges as secrets and betrayals threaten their love and future together.
